item.title: Large overgrown with hanging branches, 5th October
item.description:
The trees that line Foots Cray Rec, alongside the houses in the top corner of Haven Close, have once again been allowed to grow put of control. They tower above the houses and in the recent winds branches have been coming down. Luckily they did not hit the cars, this time, as they would have caused damage. The trees are also again pushing through the house boundary fences causing damage. If a large brach comes down it is going to cause some real damage or hurt someone
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haven Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet
